name: The Counts Youngest Son Is a Player
author: Konsonan
content: [Activating closed beta system. Current number of users: 1.]Bae DoHyun lost his life because of the major guilds&#039 evil plan. He then possesed the main character in a game that’s still in its beta service.Reincarnated as Rich family’s youngest son, Raul.“I’ll take it all this time!”From Rank 1 player to the most powerful NPC, his new story begins.
